scripts.formatter: npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp database.json dist/database.json && cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && zip -r mystore-backend.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build-staging: export ENV='staging' && npm run clean && tsc && cp database.json dist/database.json && cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && zip -r mystore-backend.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build-prod: export ENV='prod' && npm run clean && tsc && cp database.json dist/database.json && cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && zip -r mystore-backend.zip . && cd ..
scripts.test-staging: export ENV='staging' && tsc && db-migrate --env staging-test up && jasmine-ts && db-migrate reset --env staging-test
scripts.test-prod: export ENV='prod' && tsc && db-migrate --env prod-test up && jasmine-ts && db-migrate reset --env prod-test
scripts.test: export ENV='test' && tsc && db-migrate --env test up && jasmine-ts && db-migrate reset --env test
